item.title: 5 Cafes You Need To Visit In Chiang Mai
item.description: What could you possibly want if you find yourself in a popular (but laid back) city beaming with warm locals, friendly expats, and an endless list of awesome activities? How about taking a break to find a welcoming place that serves a decent drink, like a much-needed cup of tea or coffee? Well, youâ€™ve still come to the right place then, because Chiang Mai has a booming cafe culture that shows no sign of slowing down!
